name: Blueleaf Wealth, Inc.
description: Operator of a wealth management platform intended to expand access to quality financial advice. The company's platform offers account aggregation that automatically discovers assets, to provide a portal that reaches out to deliver value to clients by eliminating traditional reporting tasks and operational burdens, enabling financial advisors to increase their revenue and gain more clients.
one_liner: Operator of a wealth management platform intended to expand access to quality financial advice. The company's platform offers account aggregation that automatically discovers assets, to provide a portal that reaches out to deliver value to clients by eliminating traditional reporting tasks and operational burdens, enabling financial advisors to increase their revenue and gain more clients.
